summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Advanced vitamin C serum with natural Antioxidant for fine lines and wrinkles Firm and Youthful formula by Essy Review Date: 2017/09/13 Store: Essy Product Description: ['Essy Beauty Vitamin C Serum is the natural way to obtain younger looking skin without any harsh chemicals.', "Vitamin C is known for its anti-oxidant properties that are powerful and effective in repairing and protecting skin from UV damage and pollutants. It's an industry recognized ingredient that diminishes years of wrinkles and fine lines for a smoother and more beautiful complexion.", 'Benefits:', '-Reverse UV damage -Lighten dark spots and acne scars -Repair skin -Reduce wrinkles and fine lines -Prevent further hyper pigmentation -Increase collagen production -Even out skin tone -Prevent acne breakouts -Gentle enough for sensitive skin', 'Directions:', 'Cleanse and dry your face and neck. After toner, massage a small amount of Essy Beauty Vitamin C Serum to your face, neck and décolleté until fully absorbed. Follow with your regular moisturizer. For best results, we recommend using this serum every night before bedtime.', 'Caution:', 'For external use only. Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Patch test on skin before first use. If skin irritation occurs, stop use. Keep out of reach of children and pets. Please store in a cool place.'] Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Essy', 'Unit Count': '1.02 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 3.1 x 1.6 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '736631212993'} Review Text: I've been using this serum twice a week for the last 3 weeks and my skin feels great.
Almost immediately after putting it on my pores become visibly smaller. The discoloration and redness on my cheeks and forehead are much less visible in the morning if I use it at night.
This serum works just as well as the high-end ones and is at a much more reasonable price.
I'm definitely recommending this brand to all my friends. Review Title: Great Inexpensive Serum Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Beauty Glazed Gorgeous Me Eyeshadow Palette Matte Professional 63 Colors Eyeshadow Cosmetic Matte Eyeshadow Cream +Makeup Brushes Set and Powder Blender Sponge Review Date: 2018/09/05 Store: Beauty Glazed Average Rating: 3.7 Product Details: {'Color': 'B37-63 Shades', 'Brand': 'Beauty Glazed', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Finish Type': 'Matte', 'Special Feature': 'Travel size, Matte', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '5.79 x 3.9 x 0.59 inches; 13.76 Ounces', 'UPC': '711796032686', 'Manufacturer': 'Beauty Glazed'} Review Text: This palette doesn't have all the qualities of a high end eyeshadow palette, but it is one of the best low cost palettes I've gotten before.
I love the range and variety of colors in this palette. All of the shimmers are highly pigmented and the matted come out great on the eye. The more vibrant shimmers do have a lot of fallout so I'd suggest using a shadow shield or doing your foundation and concealer after so you can cover it up. Also I would highly recommend using your finger or a sponge tip brush to apply the shimmers and pack on the color. Review Title: Great Budget Friendly Palette Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Azure OLD PEEL OFF COLLECTION (Fantasy Collection) Review Date: 2019/06/23 Store: Azure Cosmetics Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Azure Cosmetics', 'Scent': 'Lavender', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Unit Count': '2.7 Ounce', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '1.5 x 1.5 x 5.5 inches; 10.41 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'SG_B07JFDJTGC_US', 'UPC': '689513274407'} Review Text: These masks are really cute and glittery. They're perfect for a fun girl's night and really pull everything out of your pores, but I'm not the biggest fan of the scents. The strawberry cupcake one is okay, but the other two smell like child's medicine. It doesn't linger once the mask is applied and starts drying so it doesn't bother me too much. Just keep it in mind if you're very sensitive to smells. Review Title: Cute and Glittery Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Double Color Lipstick Waterproof Long-Lasting Lip Gloss Moisturzing Nourishing Lipsticks Balm Lip Cosmetics By Shouhengda (4 Colors Set（5678） Review Date: 2020/07/16 Store: Shouhengda Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '6.93 x 6.3 x 2.91 inches; 4.62 Ounces'} Review Text: I wouldn't call these tints since they aren't the most long lasting, but they are still pretty nevertheless. I would recommend applying a lip balm before applying the ombre tint because it'll make it so much easier. All of the colors are very pretty & unique from one another. I didn't get any repeats. Review Title: Easy ombre lip Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Magic Your Life Lip Gloss Smooth Tint 6 Sets Review Date: 2021/03/05 Store: Ocean Blue Co Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ocean Blue Co', 'Item Form': 'Liquid, Cream', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Skin Tone': 'All', 'Package Information': 'Tube', 'UPC': '738685260548'} Review Text: I love collecting lip products in adorable packaging & I also love lip tints so these cute little cones are a match made in heaven for me. The packaging feels sturdy & secure so I'm pretty sure these won't leak in my purse. The tints themselves are long lasting & very pigmented. I still have some stains from where I swatched them 😅 They were all packed in a small bubble mailer with super pretty gold confetti which was a nice touch. They also included two stickers (a starfish & a sea turtle) which is super nice of them. If I see anything else from this seller that I like then I'll definitely buy it. Review Title: Super cute & pigmented tints Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: DAGEDA Color Changing Liquid Lipstick Set, 3Pcs Aloe Vera Color-Change Moisturizing Lip Oil, Temperature Color Changing Hydrated Travel Size Lip Gloss&Long Lasting Plumper Repair Lips Skin Care Kit Review Date: 2021/03/05 Store: DAGEDA Average Rating: 3.6 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DAGEDA', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Package Dimensions': '5.24 x 3.66 x 1.18 inches; 1.41 Ounces', 'UPC': '767065401561'} Review Text: I love the bright bubble gum pink that most color changing lip products turn in to & I love cute makeup packaging so I knew I love these. One of them did leak a bit in transit, but luckily nothing else I bought was stained. All 3 are the same shade of pink so don't get these expecting 3 different colors. They are very moisturizing & the color is long lasting. They have a light floral scent, but it isn't noticeable once you put it on. I don't mind fragrances in lip products so it doesn't bother me. Review Title: Super cute & pigmented Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: DAGEDA Lip Balm,6Boxs Colorful Fruity Moisturizing Jelly Lip Lotion Set,Travel Size Hydrating Nourishing Repair Lip Balms For Cracked Dry Lips&Plumper Soften Lips Mask Skin Care Gift Kit For Kid Women Review Date: 2021/03/05 Store: DAGEDA Average Rating: 4.2 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DAGEDA', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Balm', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Material Feature': 'Cruelty Free', 'Package Dimensions': '5.79 x 4.65 x 1.06 inches; 4.59 Ounces', 'UPC': '767065401431'} Review Text: I'll be honest, I mainly bought these because of how adorable these are. I love macarons & these look just like them. The containers are secure & feel sturdy, but are also lightweight. The lip balms are really nice & have a jelly like texture. They aren't as moisturizing are Laneige or Vaseline lip balms, but I like that they aren't super thick because they work well under lipstick without messing it up like other lip balms do sometimes. They all smell amazing. The pink one (strawberry I think) is definitely my favorite. Once I'm done with the lip balms I'm definitely keeping the containers to use for other things. Review Title: So cute 😍 Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: DAGEDA Lip Balm,6Boxs Colorful Shiny Fruity Moisturizing Jelly Lip Lotion with Brush,Travel Size Hydrating Repair Shimmer Lip Balms for Cracked Dry Lips&Diamond Plumper Lips Mask Skin Care Gift Kit Review Date: 2021/03/05 Store: DAGEDA Average Rating: 5.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'DAGEDA', 'Item Form': 'Lotion,Balm', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy, Shimmery', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Package Dimensions': '4.88 x 3.7 x 1.02 inches; 4.23 Ounces', 'UPC': '767065401448'} Review Text: These little lip balms are super cute & add the right amount of sparkles to my lips. The pictures on the containers do feel like they'll come off easily which is disappointing since they're so cute, but the containers themselves are nice & a good size. The lip balms have a jelly like texture & all have the same fruity scent. The red one leaves the most color on my lips, but they all leave my lips sparkly & shiny. They look great worn alone or under a lip gloss or tint. Review Title: Sparkly & Cute Rating: 5.0 --------------------------------------------------

Based on this purchase history, analyze and summarize this person's genuine preferences and patterns in under 256 words. Think step by step: 1. First, identify consistent patterns in ratings and sentiments 2. Next, observe common themes across product purposes and use cases 3. Then, note recurring quality preferences and price sensitivity patterns 4. Finally, synthesize these observations into core preferences Remember to: - Focus only on keywords and trends supported by multiple interactions - Avoid repeating specific product names or details - Base conclusions strictly on the provided purchase data Here's the purchase data: === Purchase Information === Product Title: Advanced vitamin C serum with natural Antioxidant for fine lines and wrinkles Firm and Youthful formula by Essy Review Date: 2017/09/13 Store: Essy Product Description: ['Essy Beauty Vitamin C Serum is the natural way to obtain younger looking skin without any harsh chemicals.', "Vitamin C is known for its anti-oxidant properties that are powerful and effective in repairing and protecting skin from UV damage and pollutants. It's an industry recognized ingredient that diminishes years of wrinkles and fine lines for a smoother and more beautiful complexion.", 'Benefits:', '-Reverse UV damage -Lighten dark spots and acne scars -Repair skin -Reduce wrinkles and fine lines -Prevent further hyper pigmentation -Increase collagen production -Even out skin tone -Prevent acne breakouts -Gentle enough for sensitive skin', 'Directions:', 'Cleanse and dry your face and neck. After toner, massage a small amount of Essy Beauty Vitamin C Serum to your face, neck and décolleté until fully absorbed. Follow with your regular moisturizer. For best results, we recommend using this serum every night before bedtime.', 'Caution:', 'For external use only. Do not apply to irritated or damaged skin. Avoid direct contact with eyes. Patch test on skin before first use. If skin irritation occurs, stop use. Keep out of reach of children and pets. Please store in a cool place.'] Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Use for': 'Neck, Face', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Essy', 'Unit Count': '1.02 Fl Oz', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Package Dimensions': '3.4 x 3.1 x 1.6 inches; 3.2 Ounces', 'UPC': '736631212993'} Review Text: I've been using this serum twice a week for the last 3 weeks and my skin feels great.

I'm definitely recommending this brand to all my friends. I love the range and variety of colors in this palette. All of the shimmers are highly pigmented and the matted come out great on the eye. Review Title: Sparkly & Cute Rating: 5.0 -------------------------------------------------- Structure your response as: SUMMARY: [Final synthesis of preferences and patterns]
raw_response:
SUMMARY:
The purchase history reveals a strong preference for skincare and cosmetic products, particularly those that offer anti-aging benefits, are budget-friendly, and possess appealing packaging. Consistently high ratings, especially for skincare items, suggest a positive sentiment towards products that deliver results without harsh chemicals and offer good value for money. 

Common themes include a focus on products that enhance appearance, with a notable emphasis on moisturizing and nourishing properties. The individual demonstrates a preference for vibrant, pigmented makeup, especially in lip products, while also valuing the aesthetics of packaging, often choosing items designed in cute shapes or colors.

Quality preferences lean towards effectiveness; however, the purchases indicate price sensitivity, as the consumer favors budget-friendly options that still maintain satisfactory quality over high-end products. This is particularly evident in the skincare and eyeshadow palette purchases, which received positive feedback despite being more affordable.

Ultimately, the core preferences of this individual are centered around skincare that promotes youthful skin, vibrant and visually appealing makeup that is budget-conscious, and products that provide a fun user experience through unique packaging.

target_interaction.title: Very moisturizing
target_interaction.text: All of these lip balms smell amazing, but the strawberry & honey ones are definitely my favorite 😋. They're moisturizing & make my lips feel great. I love the variety in the scents/flavors.
